analytic.title: At the Margins of the World: The Desert as a Fictionalized Space in Pseudo-Neilos’ Narrations and the History of the Great Deeds of Bishop Paul of Qentos and Priest John of Edessa

monogr.title: Narrative, Imagination and Concepts of Fiction in Late Antique Hagiography

body.bibl: Binggeli, André. “At the Margins of the World: The Desert as a Fictionalized Space in Pseudo-Neilos’ Narrations and the History of the Great Deeds of Bishop Paul of Qentos and Priest John of Edessa.” In Narrative, Imagination and Concepts of Fiction in Late Antique Hagiography, edited by Julie van Pelt and Koen De Temmerman, 94–107. Mnemosyne Supplements 478. Leiden: Brill, 2024.
